function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited access to testing for SARS-CoV-2 in the United States","Impact":"Inability to identify and isolate infected individuals, leading to unmitigated spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Increase access to testing through widespread availability and improved testing infrastructure","Technologies":"Rapid and accurate diagnostic testing, mobile testing units","People":"General public, healthcare workers, government officials","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Presence of SARS-CoV-2 in wastewater","Impact":"Potential for undetected spread of the virus in communities","Mitigation":"Implement wastewater-based surveillance to detect virus presence and estimate population prevalence","Technologies":"Wastewater testing, genomic sequencing","People":"Public health officials, researchers, wastewater treatment facilities","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions, wastewater treatment facilities"},{"Description":"Inadequate surveillance of disease outbreaks in residential communities","Impact":"Reduced ability to identify and respond to localized disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implement wastewater-based surveillance for early detection and mitigation of disease outbreaks","Technologies":"Wastewater testing, data analytics, rapid response protocols","People":"Residential communities, public health officials, local authorities","Owner":"Public health agencies, local authorities, community organizations"}]}
